name: IBANValidatorTest
description: Unit tests for IBANValidator class, focusing on validation of IBANs and related functionalities.

methods.name: checkIBAN
methods.signature: private static int checkIBAN(final File file, final IBANValidator val) throws Exception

methods.name: fmtRE
methods.signature: private static String fmtRE(final String ibanPat, final int ibanLen)

methods.name: formatToRE
methods.signature: private static String formatToRE(final String type, final int len)

methods.name: printEntry
methods.signature: private static void printEntry(final String ccode, final String length, final String ib, final String country)

test_cases.name: testGetRegexValidatortPatterns
test_cases.description: Tests the retrieval of regex patterns for a given country code.

test_cases.name: testGetValidator
test_cases.description: Tests the retrieval of validators for a given country code.

test_cases.name: testHasValidator
test_cases.description: Tests the presence of validators for a given country code.

test_cases.name: testInValid
test_cases.description: Tests the validation of invalid IBANs.

test_cases.name: testNull
test_cases.description: Tests the validation of null IBAN.

test_cases.name: testSetDefaultValidator1
test_cases.description: Tests the attempt to modify the singleton validator with an invalid length.

test_cases.name: testSetDefaultValidator2
test_cases.description: Tests the attempt to modify the singleton validator with a negative length.

test_cases.name: testSetValidatorLC
test_cases.description: Tests the attempt to set a validator with a lowercase country code.

test_cases.name: testSetValidatorLen1
test_cases.description: Tests the setting of a validator with an invalid length.

test_cases.name: testSetValidatorLen35
test_cases.description: Tests the attempt to set a validator with a length of 35.

test_cases.name: testSetValidatorLen7
test_cases.description: Tests the attempt to set a validator with a length of 7.

test_cases.name: testSorted
test_cases.description: Tests if the default validators are sorted by country code.

test_cases.name: testValid
test_cases.description: Tests the validation of valid IBANs.
